accordionItems.title: Before Starting the Course
accordionItems.content: This section introduces you to the course structure and prepares you for the content ahead.

accordionItems.title: Course Overview
accordionItems.content: A quick overview of the course and what you'll learn as a Product Manager.

accordionItems.title: Introduction to Product Management
accordionItems.content: An introduction to the basics of product management, focusing on the core skills needed to become an effective Product Manager.

accordionItems.title: What is a Product Manager?
accordionItems.content: Learn about the role of a Product Manager, their responsibilities, and key challenges they face.

accordionItems.title: Introduction to Product Development
accordionItems.content: An exploration of the product development lifecycle, including stages, processes, and tools used by product teams.

accordionItems.title: The Four Major Phases of the Product Lifecycle
accordionItems.content: This section covers the four main phases of the product lifecycle: ideation, development, launch, and growth.

accordionItems.title: Understanding the Market
accordionItems.content: How to analyze and understand the market for your product, including competitor analysis and market research techniques.

accordionItems.title: Building Product Roadmaps
accordionItems.content: Learn how to create and manage product roadmaps that guide your product's development over time.

accordionItems.title: User-Centered Design
accordionItems.content: Focuses on the importance of designing with the user in mind and the methods of user-centered design.

accordionItems.title: Agile Methodology in Product Development
accordionItems.content: Explains how to implement Agile practices in product development and manage agile teams.

accordionItems.title: Product Testing and Feedback
accordionItems.content: Learn how to test your product with real users, gather feedback, and iterate based on insights.

accordionItems.title: Managing Cross-Functional Teams
accordionItems.content: How to effectively manage and collaborate with teams from different departments, such as design, engineering, and marketing.

accordionItems.title: Product Marketing & Launch
accordionItems.content: An introduction to marketing your product, creating launch strategies, and promoting your product post-launch.

accordionItems.title: Metrics and Product Analytics
accordionItems.content: Understanding key product metrics, how to track them, and how to use analytics to inform product decisions.

accordionItems.title: Scaling Products for Growth
accordionItems.content: Learn strategies for scaling your product as it gains more users and becomes more complex.

accordionItems.title: Product Management Best Practices
accordionItems.content: Key practices and approaches that successful Product Managers follow to deliver impactful products.

accordionItems.title: Advanced Product Management
accordionItems.content: Explores advanced techniques and strategies for managing complex products at scale.

accordionItems.title: Final Project: Product Management Case Study
accordionItems.content: Capstone project where you'll apply your learnings to a real-world product management case study.

accordionItems.title: Course Wrap-Up & Final Thoughts
accordionItems.content: Reviewing the key takeaways from the course and how to apply them in your future career as a Product Manager.
